verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> Now it came to pass upon a day וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹנָתָ֤ן <WH3129> that Jonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> of Saul אֶל־ <WH413> to הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <WH5288> unto the young man נֹשֵׂ֣א <WH5375> that bare כֵלָ֔יו <WH3627> his armour לְכָ֗ה <WH1980> Come וְנַעְבְּרָה֙ <WH5674> and let us go over אֶל־ <WH413> about מַצַּ֣ב <WH4673> garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> to the Philistines' אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> is on מֵעֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> other הַלָּ֑ז <WH1975> side וּלְאָבִ֖יו <WH1> not his father לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not הִגִּֽיד׃ <WH5046> But he told

וְשָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> And Saul יוֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> tarried בִּקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> in the uttermost הַגִּבְעָ֔ה <WH1390> part of Gibeah תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> under הָרִמּ֖וֹן <WH7416> under a pomegranate tree אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּמִגְר֑וֹן <WH4051> which [is] in Migron וְהָעָם֙ <WH5971> and the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> him about כְּשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> that [were] with him [were] about six מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַאֲחִיָּ֣ה <WH281> And Ahiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִט֡וּב <WH285> of Ahitub אֲחִ֡י <WH251> brother אִיכָב֣וֹד ׀ <WH350> Ichabod's בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פִּינְחָ֨ס <WH6372> of Phinehas בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עֵלִ֜י <WH5941> of Eli כֹּהֵ֧ן ׀ <WH3548> priest יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD'S בְּשִׁל֖וֹ <WH7887> in Shiloh נֹשֵׂ֣א <WH5375> wearing אֵפ֑וֹד <WH646> an ephod וְהָעָם֙ <WH5971> And the people לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not יָדַ֔ע <WH3045> knew כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הָלַ֖ךְ <WH1980> was gone יוֹנָתָֽן׃ <WH3129> not that Jonathan

וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> Between הַֽמַּעְבְּר֗וֹת <WH4569> And between the passages אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which בִּקֵּ֤שׁ <WH1245> sought יֽוֹנָתָן֙ <WH3129> by which Jonathan לַֽעֲבֹר֙ <WH5674> to go over עַל־ <WH5921> and מַצַּ֣ב <WH4673> garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> unto the Philistines' שֵׁן־ <WH8127> [there was] a sharp הַסֶּ֤לַע <WH5553> rock מֵהָעֵ֙בֶר֙ <WH5676> on the one side מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> the one וְשֵׁן־ <WH8127> and a sharp הַסֶּ֥לַע <WH5553> rock מֵהָעֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> on the other side מִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> the other וְשֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> and the name הָֽאֶחָד֙ <WH259> of the one בּוֹצֵ֔ץ <WH949> [was] Bozez וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name הָאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> of the other סֶֽנֶּה׃ <WH5573> Seneh

הַשֵּׁ֧ן <WH8127> The forefront הָאֶחָ֛ד <WH259> of the one מָצ֥וּק <WH4690> [was] situate מִצָּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> northward מ֣וּל <WH4136> over against מִכְמָ֑שׂ <WH4363> Michmash וְהָאֶחָ֥ד <WH259> and the other מִנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> southward מ֥וּל <WH4136> over against גָּֽבַע׃ <WH1387> Gibeah ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹנָתָ֜ן <WH3083> And Jonathan אֶל־ <WH413> to הַנַּ֣עַר ׀ <WH5288> to the young man נֹשֵׂ֣א <WH5375> that bare כֵלָ֗יו <WH3627> his armour לְכָה֙ <WH1980> Come וְנַעְבְּרָ֗ה <WH5674> and let us go over אֶל־ <WH413> to מַצַּב֙ <WH4673> unto the garrison הָעֲרֵלִ֣ים <WH6189> of these uncircumcised הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> of these אוּלַ֛י <WH194> perhaps יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> will work יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> it may be that the LORD לָ֑נוּ כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֤ין <WH369> for לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> to the LORD מַעְצ֔וֹר <WH4622> for us for [there is] no restraint לְהוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <WH3467> to save בְּרַ֖ב <WH7227> by many א֥וֹ <WH176> or בִמְעָֽט׃ <WH4592> or by few

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ נֹשֵׂ֣א <WH5375> bearer כֵלָ֔יו <WH3627> his armor עֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> unto him Do כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> is in בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <WH3824> all that [is] in thine heart נְטֵ֣ה <WH5186> turn לָ֔ךְ הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold עִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> according כִּלְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <WH3824> thee behold I [am] with thee according to thy heart ס

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> Then said יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3083> Jonathan הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> we עֹבְרִ֖ים <WH5674> Behold we will pass over אֶל־ <WH413> unto הָאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH582> unto [these] men וְנִגְלִ֖ינוּ <WH1540> and we will discover אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

אִם־ <WH518> If כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> they יֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> If they say אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <WH413> to us דֹּ֕מּוּ <WH1826> thus unto us Tarry עַד־ <WH5704> until הַגִּיעֵ֖נוּ <WH5060> until we come אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> to you וְעָמַ֣דְנוּ <WH5975> to you then we will stand still תַחְתֵּ֔ינוּ <WH8478> our place וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not נַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> in our place and will not go up אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> But

וְאִם־ <WH518> if כֹּ֨ה <WH3541> they יֹאמְר֜וּ <WH559> But if they say עֲל֤וּ <WH5927> thus Come up עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> us וְעָלִ֔ינוּ <WH5927> unto us then we will go up כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נְתָנָ֥ם <WH5414> hath delivered יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD בְּיָדֵ֑נוּ <WH3027> them into our hand וְזֶה־ <WH2088> and this לָּ֖נוּ הָאֽוֹת׃ <WH226> and this [shall be] a sign

וַיִּגָּל֣וּ <WH1540> of them discovered שְׁנֵיהֶ֔ם <WH8147> And both אֶל־ <WH413> to מַצַּ֖ב <WH4673> themselves unto the garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> said פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> and the Philistines הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold עִבְרִים֙ <WH5680> Behold the Hebrews יֹֽצְאִ֔ים <WH3318> come forth מִן־ <WH4480> out הַחֹרִ֖ים <WH2356> out of the holes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> they הִתְחַבְּאוּ־ <WH2244> where they had hid שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

וַיַּעֲנוּ֩ <WH6030> answered אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> the men הַמַּצָּבָ֜ה <WH4675> of the garrison אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹנָתָ֣ן ׀ <WH3129> Jonathan וְאֶת־ <WH853> נֹשֵׂ֣א <WH5375> bearer כֵלָ֗יו <WH3627> and his armor וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and said עֲל֣וּ <WH5927> Come up אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <WH413> to וְנוֹדִ֥יעָה <WH3045> to us and we will shew אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> you a thing פ וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹנָתָ֜ן <WH3129> And Jonathan אֶל־ <WH413> about נֹשֵׂ֤א <WH5375> bearer כֵלָיו֙ <WH3627> to his armor עֲלֵ֣ה <WH5927> Come up אַחֲרַ֔י <WH310> after כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נְתָנָ֥ם <WH5414> hath delivered יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> me for the LORD בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> them into the hand יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> climbed up יוֹנָתָ֗ן <WH3129> And Jonathan עַל־ <WH5921> on יָדָיו֙ <WH3027> upon his hands וְעַל־ <WH5921> and רַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> and upon his feet וְנֹשֵׂ֥א <WH5375> bearer כֵלָ֖יו <WH3627> his armor אַחֲרָ֑יו <WH310> after וַֽיִּפְּלוּ֙ <WH5307> him and they fell לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יוֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3129> Jonathan וְנֹשֵׂ֥א <WH5375> bearer כֵלָ֖יו <WH3627> and his armor מְמוֹתֵ֥ת <WH4191> slew אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> after

וַתְּהִ֞י <WH1961> become הַמַּכָּ֣ה <WH4347> slaughter הָרִאשֹׁנָ֗ה <WH7223> And that first אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הִכָּ֧ה <WH5221> made יוֹנָתָ֛ן <WH3129> which Jonathan וְנֹשֵׂ֥א <WH5375> bearer כֵלָ֖יו <WH3627> and his armor כְּעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> was about twenty אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> men כְּבַחֲצִ֥י <WH2677> within as it were an half מַעֲנָ֖ה <WH4618> acre צֶ֥מֶד <WH6776> [which] a yoke שָׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of land

וַתְּהִי֩ <WH1961> became חֲרָדָ֨ה <WH2731> And there was trembling בַמַּחֲנֶ֤ה <WH4264> in the host בַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> in the field וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and among all the people הַמַּצָּב֙ <WH4673> the garrison וְהַמַּשְׁחִ֔ית <WH7843> and the spoilers חָרְד֖וּ <WH2729> they also trembled גַּם־ <WH1571> Even הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> like וַתִּרְגַּ֣ז <WH7264> quaked הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> and the earth וַתְּהִ֖י <WH1961> became לְחֶרְדַּ֥ת <WH2731> trembling אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> so it was a very great

וַיִּרְא֤וּ <WH7200> looked הַצֹּפִים֙ <WH6822> And the watchmen לְשָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul בְּגִבְעַ֖ת <WH1390> in Gibeah בִּנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וְהִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> and behold הֶהָמ֛וֹן <WH1995> and behold the multitude נָמ֖וֹג <WH4127> melted away וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went וַהֲלֹֽם׃ <WH1986> on beating down פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> Saul לָעָם֙ <WH5971> unto the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for פִּקְדוּ־ <WH6485> that [were] with him Number נָ֣א <WH4994> now וּרְא֔וּ <WH7200> now and see מִ֖י <WH4310> who הָלַ֣ךְ <WH1980> who is gone מֵעִמָּ֑נוּ <WH5973> they וַֽיִּפְקְד֔וּ <WH6485> from us And when they had numbered וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> behold אֵ֥ין <WH369> behold יוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3129> behold Jonathan וְנֹשֵׂ֥א <WH5375> bearer כֵלָֽיו׃ <WH3627> and his armor

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> And Saul לַֽאֲחִיָּ֔ה <WH281> unto Ahiah הַגִּ֖ישָׁה <WH5066> Bring hither אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיָ֞ה <WH1961> become אֲר֧וֹן <WH727> For the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> of God בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> was at that time הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> with the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become עַ֣ד <WH5704> While דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> talked שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> And it came to pass while Saul אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> unto the priest וְהֶהָמ֗וֹן <WH1995> that the noise אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> it בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> that [was] in the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> on הָל֖וֹךְ <WH1980> continued וָרָ֑ב <WH7227> and increased פ וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁא֛וּל <WH7586> and Saul אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> unto the priest אֱסֹ֥ף <WH622> Withdraw יָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> thine hand

וַיִּזָּעֵ֣ק <WH2199> that [were] with him assembled שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> And Saul וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> themselves and they came עַד־ <WH5704> against הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> to the battle וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold הָיְתָ֜ה <WH1961> become חֶ֤רֶב <WH2719> sword אִישׁ֙ <WH376> and behold every man's בְּרֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> was against his fellow מְהוּמָ֖ה <WH4103> discomfiture גְּדוֹלָ֥ה <WH1419> great מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> [and there was] a very

וְהָעִבְרִ֗ים <WH5680> Moreover the Hebrews הָי֤וּ <WH1961> were with לַפְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> [that] were with the Philistines כְּאֶתְמ֣וֹל <WH865> before שִׁלְשׁ֔וֹם <WH8032> that time אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who עָל֥וּ <WH5927> which went up עִמָּ֛ם <WH5973> in בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> with them into the camp סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> [from the country] round about וְגַם־ <WH1571> even הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> like לִֽהְיוֹת֙ <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> to be with יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> even they also [turned] to be with the Israelites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who עִם־ <WH5973> with שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> that [were] with Saul וְיוֹנָתָֽן׃ <WH3129> and Jonathan

וְכֹל֩ <WH3605> all אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> Likewise all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel הַמִּֽתְחַבְּאִ֤ים <WH2244> which had hid בְּהַר־ <WH2022> themselves in mount אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> Ephraim שָֽׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> [when] they heard כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָ֖סוּ <WH5127> fled פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> that the Philistines וַֽיַּדְבְּק֥וּ <WH1692> even they also followed hard גַם־ <WH1571> even הֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> like אַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH310> after בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> them in the battle

וַיּ֧וֹשַׁע <WH3467> saved יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> So the LORD בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וְהַ֨מִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> and the battle עָבְרָ֖ה <WH5674> passed over אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית אָֽוֶן׃ <WH1007> unto Bethaven

וְאִֽישׁ־ <WH376> And the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> of Israel נִגַּ֖שׂ <WH5065> were distressed בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַיֹּאֶל֩ <WH422> had adjured שָׁא֨וּל <WH7586> for Saul אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> the people לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying אָר֣וּר <WH779> Cursed הָ֠אִישׁ <WH376> [be] the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יֹ֨אכַל <WH398> that eateth לֶ֜חֶם <WH3899> [any] food עַד־ <WH5704> before הָעֶ֗רֶב <WH6153> until evening וְנִקַּמְתִּי֙ <WH5358> that I may be avenged מֵאֹ֣יְבַ֔י <WH341> on mine enemies וְלֹֽא <WH3808> not טָעַ֥ם <WH2938> tasted כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> So none of the people לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> [any] food ס
